# [Welcome!]{style="color:red;"}

I am Yuhang Xu/徐雨航, currently a joint Ph.D. student from the [Department of Linguistics](http://www.ling.rochester.edu/) and the [Department of Brain & Cognitive Sciences](https://www.bcs.rochester.edu/), [University of Rochester](https://www.rochester.edu/). I am working with [Dr. Jeffrey Runner](http://www.ling.rochester.edu/people/faculty/runner_jeff/index.html)and [Dr. Michael K. Tanenhaus](https://www.amacad.org/person/michael-k-tanenhaus) at the U of R as well as [Dr.Qingrong Chen](http://schools.njnu.edu.cn/psy/person/qingrong-chen) at the [Nanjing Normal University](http://en.njnu.edu.cn/).

My [CV](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Md0F_yIpvaOmMfUM2_80HqrZRLhoOIGj/view?usp=sharing).

-   ***2025***

    I am working as a part-time researcher at the [Analytics-Assessment Research Centre](https://arc2538.wixsite.com/arc2018) as well as the [Department of Mathematics and Information Technology](https://www.eduhk.hk/mit/en/), EdUHK. I am participating in a project focused on developing learners' problem-solving competence using a digital storytelling-driven gamification approach under the direction of Dr. [Bai Shurui](https://www.eduhk.hk/mit/en/staff/tstbai). 😀 New Experience\~
